author: Stupid Triggered Poongoon

text:
It's still worth it to get a better feel for how Yuri ended up the way he is in 2. Believe it or not he was even more of an obnoxious braggart in the first game, and his unfolding relationship with Alice is very sweet and tragic.

It's much more slow going than it's successors though, and you might have to push through some dull patches to get to the good stuff. Definitely play it if you love SH2 as much as me.

author: AJ 21K

text:
I haven't played the game in forever. Either way, it was still spoiled. He (and I admittedly) just missplaced the demonic names (both began with A).

The theme of this battle had nothing to do with the argument. Point is, up until the point IN GAME where I heard this theme, Nikolai's motives/happenings or whatever were not revealed to the extent that I got spoiled. So when I look it up and some guy says "MAN I'M GLAD HE WAS X SO I COULD KILL HIM" yeah that is pretty much a spoiler.
author: Joey Blade

text:
No he didn't : /

Nikolai gained Asmodeus' power/fusion thing near the end, I was not expecting that and, as of the first time I heard this battle theme (Ladder to Heaven), I honestly thought Nikolai would be the 8th party member.
